tasks.label: C/C++: g++ build, run and compare output
args: g++ -std=c++11 "${fileBasename}" -o "${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out" && "./${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out" < input.txt > output.txt && if cmp -s output.txt expected.txt; then echo -e "\033[32mTEST CASE PASSED ✅\033[0m"; else echo -e "\033[31mTEST CASE FAILED ❌\033[0m"; fi && rm -f "${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out"
